body.p: In a business combination achieved by contract alone, the acquirer shall attribute to the owners of the acquiree the amount of the acquiree’s net assets recognised in accordance with this IFRS. In other words, the equity interests in the acquiree held by parties other than the acquirer are a non‑controlling interest in the acquirer’s post‑combination financial statements even if the result is that all of the equity interests in the acquiree are attributed to the non‑controlling interest.
